comment: Lemma for our Axiom of Infinity => standard Axiom of Infinity. See ~ inf3 for detailed description. In the proof, we invoke the Axiom of Replacement in the form of ~ f1dmex . (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-1996.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2013.)
